talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Weren't you all so excited that
<clr:0000>YunoboCo <clr:ffff>was gonna be buildin'
<clr:0000>Mine-Cart Land<clr:ffff> here?
talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:ArrogantLaughS>Who cares about Mine-Cart Land when
there's <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff> to chomp!
talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>YunoboCo handles everything from minin'
ore to sellin' it. We rely on 'em to keep
our economy going.
They had big plans for <clr:0000>Mine-Cart Land<clr:ffff>,
but it looks like the grand openin' is a
ways off yet.
Oh, and if it's ore yer after, try going to
the <clr:0000>company store<clr:ffff> up ahead. Or ya can
get some in the city.
Their prices are <clr:0000>half<clr:ffff> of what's normal, so
ya get a good deal.
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Yer chompin' instead of workin'. At this
rate, the Southern Mine—no, <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>
as a whole—is done fer.
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You were so excited that <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>
was gonna build <clr:0000>Mine-Cart Land <clr:ffff>here...
What's gotten into you?
talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Are you a traveler?<sp:5:1:0> Then ya might like to
<sp:5:0:0>try a mornin' bath.
talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You should head to <clr:0000>Mine-Cart Land<clr:ffff>!


It's YunoboCo's masterwork! Course,
I helped build it too.

Once you leave the city gate, head
straight down the road, and you'll
see it on your <clr:0000>left<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When I'm feelin' better, I intend to have a
good time there myself.
talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Mine-Cart Land <clr:ffff>is an amusement park
that we started buildin' at the request of
<clr:0000>President Yunobo<clr:ffff>, head of <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>.
He wanted to create an attraction to draw
travelers in—somethin' fun.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But lately all the young Gorons won't do a
lick of work, and the project's come to a
screeching halt.
talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Don't just sit around eatin' <clr:0000>marbled rock<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>roast<clr:ffff>—get to work!
talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The best place for travelers to check
out round here is <clr:0000>Mine-Cart Land<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>It's YunoboCo's masterwork. I helped
work on the rails there.

Once you leave the city gate, head
straight down the road, and you'll
come across it on your <clr:0000>left<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I really hope you go see it.
